item.description: After looking around on the internet for a bit, I found that there is a flu shot clinic at Whittier Street Health Center from 10am until 2pm on Saturday November 20th. I will show up around noon most likely, but you are more than welcome to go at 10am and do what you can. I think it would be a great idea to be out there handing out flyers and DVDs and spreading the truth about the vaccines and big pharma. This is a very good place to demonstrate because of it's proximity to a lot of colleges. We have many new members over the past couple weeks. Let's get out there and do something! Make flyers, burn DVDs, make signs if you want, bring a bullhorn if you have one. Let's bring down this matrix one step at a time!

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Flu Shot Awareness Demonstration at Whittier Street Health Center
